about_the_game:
The Concept Guidebook was created to convey the world view, concept, and production process of "QUESTER".
It is a 64-page full-color e-book (PDF file).

-----
Operation Manual for "QUESTER" (V4)
Initial Character Class Description
Creature Manual
Creature Data
Main Creator Conversation ~ Kazuyoshi Hagiwara, Hironori Kato, Toshimichi Kuwahara
～Ninja Masuda's Closed Beta Experience - QUESTER, that it is!
～Interview with the creator of "QUESTER" by Ninja Masuda
Sheet music "QUESTER Battle BGM
QUESTER Friendship Society
List of Crowdfunding Supporters (1st)
-----

Specifications and data are subject to change. Please understand and enjoy.

The information is based on the closed beta version (V4).

*The cover page is attached, so please use the "Show Cover Page Separately" function when viewing the spread.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11 64bit
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster with 2 or more cores on a compatible 64-bit processor or System on a Chip (SoC)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 12 or later with WDDM 2.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
